function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Calibrated activity count a may not accurately represent the actual number of people frequenting a street segment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anonymized mobility data may compromise individual privacy and data security.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users, potentially skewing the results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conversion of relative estimates into absolute activity numbers may introduce errors due to calibration and sampling limitations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detrending the time series data to account for the long-term trend in strava data may oversimplify the analysis and mask important variations in activity patterns.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large number of people using outdoor recreational infrastructure","category":"Structures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Advising individuals in quarantine to recreate outdoors with no range limitation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Substantial user base in norway for strava with recording of outdoor activities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increase in recreational activity due to lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for green views leading to increased recreational activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in recreational use on remote trails due to social distancing advisories","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of public green spaces during lockdown","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment due to covid-19-related furlough","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in daily schedules and work-life balance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of sar-cov-2 in densely populated urban areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence for the role of urban nature in pandemic resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with increased demand for recreational activity in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uso de redes sociales para comunicar medidas gubernamentales durante la pandemia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difusión de noticias falsas e información poco rigurosa","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uso de memes para difundir mensajes relacionados con la pandemia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relacionar personajes populares con mensajes sobre la pandemia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desconfianza en los políticos por favoritismos en la entrega de bonos.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Estereotipos de género asociados a la distribución de roles en la sociedad durante la pandemia.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impacto positivo en el medio ambiente durante la pandemia y reflexión sobre el consumo.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"La sobreexposición a información exagerada sobre covid-19 en las redes sociales","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbación de rasgos negativos en las redes sociales durante la pandemia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uso inadecuado de las redes sociales durante la pandemia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"La difusión rápida de información errónea a través de las redes sociales durante brotes de enfermedades","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efectos negativos de las redes sociales en la pandemia del covid19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"La infodemia en las redes sociales, que difunde información poco rigurosa y contribuye a sentimientos de paranoia y miedo.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uso libertino e irresponsable de las redes sociales generando pánico y jugando en contra de la lucha contra la pandemia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Necesidad de fortalecer y expandir las redes sociales para evitar morbilidad y mortalidad humanas durante crisis.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting observational studies during a pandemic may pose a risk of exposure to the virus for researchers and participants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of public databases and access to information about contagious diseases may lead to the inadvertent spread of misinformation or panic through social media.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comunicación inefectiva en redes sociales respecto a la situación de la pandemia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desacuerdo y polarización en redes sociales sobre las acciones de las autoridades","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uso indebido de las redes sociales para difundir teorías conspirativas sobre la pandemia","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disseminação de informações falsas e receitas médicas não comprovadas através das redes sociais","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maior propagação do pânico e ansiedade devido a conteúdo alarmista","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Desconfiança nas medidas governamentais devido às publicações falsas e alarmistas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of false information and unproven remedies through social networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of panic-inducing content on social networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective communication of official guidelines and measures on social networks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of unverified medical information and false news on social media can contribute to panic and misinformation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social media platforms can be used to incite panic and spread false information about the pandemic, contributing to public distrust and confusion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mismanagement of crisis communication on social media can lead to ineffective dissemination of accurate information and exacerbate public fear and confusion.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Normalization of non-compliance with covid-19 measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate trust in science and media reporting","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
